code: export var calculateCardIndex=function calculateCardIndex(x,l){return(x<0?x+l:x)%l;};export var calculateFirstCardIndex=function calculateFirstCardIndex(i,firstVis,firstVisIdx,idx){return idx(i-firstVis+firstVisIdx);};export var calculateRank=function calculateRank(firstVis,firstVisIdx,position,l,y){return firstVis-(y<0?l:0)+position-firstVisIdx+(y<0&&firstVis===0?l:0);};
